tasks.name: Truck Unload & Sort
tasks.description: Unload overnight delivery truck and sort produce for stocking.

tasks.name: Pull Backstock Carts to Floor
tasks.description: Pull all temperature-safe backstock carts to the sales floor.

tasks.name: Monthly Full Produce Inventory
tasks.description: Conduct a full inventory count of all produce items in the department.

tasks.name: Weekly Ad/First Impression Change
tasks.description: Update all ad signage and refresh first impression displays.

tasks.name: Weekly Deep Clean - Salad Wall
tasks.description: Thoroughly clean and sanitize the salad wall display.

tasks.name: IMS Audit Finalization
tasks.description: Finalize weekly IMS audit and reconcile discrepancies.

tasks.name: DOB Order
tasks.description: Place daily produce order with the distribution center.

tasks.name: Freshpak Order
tasks.description: Place daily order for pre-packaged produce items.

tasks.name: First Impressions
tasks.description: Ensure the entrance and front displays are perfectly stocked and appealing.

tasks.name: Banana/Citrus Table
tasks.description: Stock and maintain the banana and citrus display table.

tasks.name: Apple Bulk/Bagged Table
tasks.description: Stock and maintain the apple bulk and bagged display table.

tasks.name: Tropical/Harvest Table
tasks.description: Stock and maintain the tropical and harvest produce table.

tasks.name: Berries/Grapes Table
tasks.description: Stock and maintain the berries and grapes display table.

tasks.name: Tomato/Pepper Table
tasks.description: Stock and maintain the tomato and pepper display table.

tasks.name: Organic Produce Table
tasks.description: Stock and maintain the organic produce display table.

tasks.name: Potato/Onion Table
tasks.description: Stock and maintain the potato and onion display table.

tasks.name: Dry Stock
tasks.description: Stock and maintain dry stock items like nuts, croutons, and dried fruit.

tasks.name: Freshpak Wall Service
tasks.description: Service and replenish the fresh-packed produce wall.

tasks.name: Salad/Juice Wall Service
tasks.description: Service and replenish the salad and juice wall.

tasks.name: Mirror Wall Service
tasks.description: Service and replenish the mirror wall displays.

tasks.name: Wet Rack/Herb Service
tasks.description: Service and replenish the wet rack and herb displays.

tasks.name: Mid-Morning Refill (High Turnover)
tasks.description: Perform a mid-morning refill of high-turnover items.

tasks.name: Post-Set Floor Check & Spot Clean
tasks.description: Perform a floor check after initial setup and conduct spot cleaning.

tasks.name: Produce Bag Roll Restock
tasks.description: Restock produce bag rolls at all stations.

tasks.name: Markdowns
tasks.description: Identify and markdown items nearing expiration or quality decline.

tasks.name: Shop Back Customer Returns
tasks.description: Process items returned by customers at the service desk.

tasks.name: Customer Putbacks
tasks.description: Collect and restock items left by customers around the store.

tasks.name: Throwaways
tasks.description: Process and dispose of unsaleable produce.

tasks.name: FlashFood Bags
tasks.description: Prepare FlashFood bags for discounted produce.

tasks.name: IMS Audits
tasks.description: Perform daily IMS inventory scans and audits.

tasks.name: Breakdown Pallets in Cooler
tasks.description: Fully breakdown and combine previous day pallets in cooler.

tasks.name: Pull Expired Sale Tags
tasks.description: On Saturday nights, pull all expired sale tags and signs.

tasks.name: Process Organics
tasks.description: Process and stock organic produce deliveries.

tasks.name: Sweep & Mop Floor
tasks.description: Maintain cleanliness of the produce floor.

tasks.name: Clear Empty Cardboard
tasks.description: Clear empty cardboard from tables and take to bailer.

tasks.name: Facing Displays
tasks.description: Continuously face and rotate produce on displays.

tasks.name: Backroom Cleanliness
tasks.description: Maintain organization and cleanliness in the produce backroom.
